archimate:Stakeholder.name: Product Owners
archimate:Stakeholder.documentation: Product Owners care about where their products and services are going. They have a vision, and are accountable for its delivery. They connect people with one another to achieve those aims, and they are strong subject-matter experts. They inspire, motivate, mentor, and guide those around them, and use frequent, engaging communication to inspire people to aim for their goals. They have a backlog of things they are attempting to achieve, and they stay part of the development and delivery process.
